name: Central Park
description: Central Park is an urban park in New York City

home.title: Welcome to Central Park
home.about: Central Park is the most visited urban park in the United States.
home.events: Check out the latest events happening in Central Park.
home.description: Central Park is an urban park in New York City
info: The park contains 58 miles of walking paths.
Central Park features 36 bridges and arches.

facilities.name: Swimming Pool
facilities.description: An outdoor pool for recreational swimming and laps

equipment.name: Pool noodles
equipment.description: Foam tubes used for buoyancy and support

equipment.name: Kickboards
equipment.description: Foam boards used for training and support

facilities.name: Tennis Court
facilities.description: An outdoor court for playing tennis

equipment.name: Tennis rackets
equipment.description: Rackets used for hitting the ball

facilities.name: Basketball Court
facilities.description: An outdoor court for playing basketball

equipment.name: Cones
equipment.description: Used for marking boundaries and drills

facilities.name: Skate Park
facilities.description: An outdoor park for skateboarding and rollerblading

facilities.name: Soccer Field
facilities.description: An outdoor field for playing soccer

equipment.name: Cones
equipment.description: Used for marking boundaries and drills

equipment.name: Goal posts
equipment.description: Used as the target for scoring goals

facilities.name: Outdoor Gym
facilities.description: An outdoor gym with various equipment for exercise

equipment.name: Resistance bands
equipment.description: Elastic bands used for resistance training

equipment.name: Pull-up bar
equipment.description: Used for upper body strength training

events.name: Concert in the Park
events.description: Join us for an evening of live music in the park! Featuring popular local bands and musicians.

events.name: Outdoor Movie Night
events.description: Bring your blankets and chairs for a night of family-friendly movies under the stars!

events.name: Park Cleanup Day
events.description: Help us keep the park clean and beautiful by participating in our annual cleanup day! All volunteers will receive a free t-shirt and lunch.

events.name: BBQ and Picnic in the Park
events.description: Bring your favorite foods and drinks and enjoy a day of grilling and picnicking in the park!

events.name: Kite Festival
events.description: Come fly a kite at our annual Kite Festival! Bring your own kite or purchase one from our vendors. Fun for all ages!

events.name: Ice Cream Social
events.description: Join us for an afternoon of ice cream and socializing in the park!
